Reviews.Title: “Ramada????”

Reviews.Content: stayed night location superbowl weekend paid normal price mind amount paid 2 star motel semi ok somewhat clean bathroom aweful actaully cleaned cant believe owned ramada chain am thankful spent 5 hours total nice front desk staff welcome suppose thats happens paying 5 star hotel price 1 star motel positive highway restaurants door
